title: Penn Township
credit_line: Gift of the family of Dr. and Mrs. Hunter H. Turner in their memory
provenance_text: John Kane [1860-1934], until 1934; Maggie Halloran Kane, his widow; Dr. Hunter H. Turner, Pittsburgh, 1934; Mrs. Hunter H. Turner, Nanticoke, MD, by 1971; Dr. Oliver E. Turner, Pittsburgh, PA,  by 1975; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, in 1975.

creator.birth_place: West Calder (West Lothian, Scotland, United Kingdom)
